localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: A free desktop app that sits in your menu bar: — select services you depend on — check their status in your menu bar — get notified when they change their status
blogPost.body: A free desktop app that sits in your menu bar: — select services you depend on — check their status in your menu bar — get notified when they change their status
blogPost.title: Instatus Out - Monitor services in your menu bar
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 一个免费的桌面应用程序，位于您的菜单栏： - 选择您所依赖的服务 - 在您的菜单栏中查看他们的状态 - 当他们改变状态时得到通知。
一個免費的桌面應用程序，位於您的菜單欄： - 選擇您所依賴的服務 - 在您的菜單欄中查看他們的狀態 - 當他們改變狀態時得到通知。

previous.excerpt: Make your videos accessible to a global audience by automatically translating your video online. Expand your reach by creating content in multiple languages, to be viewed by people from all over the globe.
previous.title: Translate Video - Auto translate your video into different languages online

localize.description: 通过在线自动翻译您的视频，让全球观众都能看到您的视频。通过创建多种语言的内容，扩大您的影响力，让全球各地的人都能看到。
localize.tagline: 自动将您的视频翻译成不同的语言在线

localize.description: 通過在線自動翻譯您的視頻，讓全球觀衆都能看到您的視頻。通過創建多種語言的內容，擴大您的影響力，讓全球各地的人都能看到。
localize.tagline: 自動將您的視頻翻譯成不同的語言在線

next.excerpt: FlutterFlow is an online no-code platform that empowers people to build native mobile apps visually, enabling quick iteration. Unlike other no-code tools, FlutterFlow makes it easy to view and export clean Flutter code that can be customized.
next.title: FlutterFlow - Build cross-platform Flutter mobile apps visually.

localize.description: FlutterFlow是一个在线无代码平台，它让人们能够可视化地构建原生移动应用，实现快速迭代。与其他无代码工具不同的是，FlutterFlow可以轻松查看和导出干净的Flutter代码，并可以进行定制。
localize.tagline: 视觉上构建跨平台的Flutter移动应用。

localize.description: FlutterFlow是一個在線無代碼平臺，它讓人們能夠可視化地構建原生移動應用，實現快速迭代。與其他無代碼工具不同的是，FlutterFlow可以輕鬆查看和導出乾淨的Flutter代碼，並可以進行定製。
localize.tagline: 視覺上構建跨平臺的Flutter移動應用。
